name: Dungeon Swap
description:
Escape the Dungeon using Game Genres!

A Lone Adventurer wanders into a dungeon, none like they have ever seen. Help them escape the dungeon by changing the genre!

General Information

Dungeon Swap is a Puzzle Platformer created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020!

Controls A Move Left D Move Right Space Action 1 Left Arrow Change to RPG Up Arrow Change to Platformer Left Arrow Change to Point & Click Down Arrow Action 2 (Also Action 1 if not applicable)

THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS NOT FINISHED
